Video.Title: Introduction to Windows Workflow in .NET 4
Video.Description: Windows Workflow in .NET 4 (WF4) is an all new workflow engine. In this episode I'm going to take you through the hands on lab from the Visual Studio 2010 training course.
Video.Abstract: Windows Workflow in .NET 4 (WF4) is an all new workflow engine. In this episode I'm going to take you through the hands on lab from the Visual Studio 2010 training course.
